jsx.ui.html
Class Div<T extends Widget>

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.Box<T>
                      jsx.ui.html.Div<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnRender, OnStyle
public final class Div<T extends Widget>
extends Box<T>

A class for HTML elementary division widgets.

Note that a Div widget is basically a Box and has some more features.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Summary
Div()
          Constructs a division widget.
 
Method Summary
 void block()
          Appends the sub CSS selector "block" to the underlying component indicating all its children will be displayed with "block" style.
 void inline()
          Removes the sub CSS selector "block" from the underlying component indicating all its children will be displayed with "inline" style.
